name: Lunala GX
author: 5ban Graphics

abilities.name: Psychic Transfer
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a {P} Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Moongeist Beam
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can’t be healed during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Lunar Fall GX
attacks.effect: Knock Out 1 of your opponent’s Basic Pokémon that isn’t a Pokémon-GX. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your Pokémon-GX is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
